fullName.jp: フライヤ・クレセント

description.jp:
行方不明の恋人を捜して旅を続ける 
容姿端麗なネズミ族の若き女竜騎士。
祖国の危機を知り 旧友のジタンと共に
救援に向かったことを皮切りに 世界を
めぐる陰謀へと巻き込まれていった。
命の大切さを深く理解するがゆえ 
無謀な仲間を諌めることも多い。
description.gl: A young Burmecian dragon knight who travels in search of her lost love. When her homeland is in danger、 she rushes to its aid with her old friend Zidane、 but winds up entangled in a world-encompassing conspiracy. Understanding very well the precious nature of life、 she often advises her reckless comrades against their rash actions.

jp.text: 大気がざわめいておる\n何かが始まるというのか……？
いま 私の竜騎士としての力が\n試される時が来たのじゃ！
あの気色の悪いやつは何者じゃ！？
フフフフフ……\nおもはゆいのう……
おぬしひとりで行かせては\n竜騎士の名がすたるな……
思い続けることの辛さより\n忘れられることが怖いのじゃ……

gl.text: The sky looks ominous... Something's about to happen.
The time has come to serve my kingdom as a Burmecian dragon knight once again!
That sinister man... Who is he?
You're obviously not going to change your mind、 so I'm coming with you.
To be forgotten is worse than death.

When using [Reis's Wind (C)]
• Increases BRV gain based on Max BRV by 20%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Special Effect duration +3

desc.en:
6-HIT Ranged AoE BRV + HP attack
BRV hits are distributed when there are multiple enemies
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
HP damage is split equally amongst all enemies
Grants [Healing Petals] for 2 turns

While [Healing Petals] is active:
• For all party members
　∟ Prevents KO if HP is at least 50% of Max HP and leaves HP value at 1

Healing Petals also has the following effects:
• Raises party Attack
• Raises party Max BRV overflow limit of stolen BRV
desc.gl:
6-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
BRV attacks distributed based on number of enemies
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 2 turns Soothing Petals
Enemy attacks will not reduce party HP below 1 while individual HP at least 50% of MAX while Soothing Petals active
desc.jp:
6HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
敵の数に応じてBRV攻撃対象は分散
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
与えるHPダメージは分配
自身に2ACTION「癒しの花弁」付与
「癒しの花弁」付与中
味方全員にそれぞれのHPが最大HPの50％以上の時
敵の攻撃でHPダメージを受けても
必ず1残る効果

• 2-HIT ranged BRV attack + HP attack

3 turns Special Effect
• Restores party's HP by 10% of Max HP

自身の攻撃力大アップし
味方全員に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
＋2HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃

name.jp: レーゼの風エクステンド

desc.en:
「Reis's Wind」 use +2

When using 「Reis's Wind」:
- Slightly raises the BRV gain based on Max BRV
- Raises party BRV based on Max BRV
- Extends the duration of「Reis's Wind」by 1 turn
- Triggers a 2-HIT ranged BRV + HP Attack after use
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

When using 「Jump」:
- Raises party BRV based on Attack
- BRV attack hit count becomes 2
- Moderately raises total BRV potency
desc.gl:
Reis's Wind use +2

When using Reis's Wind: 
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on MAX BRV, extended to party
 • Reis's Wind buff duration +1
 • Triggers additional 2-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack on target after use
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 
When using Jump:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Grants party BRV based on own ATK before BRV attack
desc.jp:
「レーゼの風」の使用回数＋2

「レーゼの風」使用時
・自身の最大BRVに依存したBRV加算量を
　小アップし味方全体化
・強化効果「レーゼの風」の1ACTION期間延長
・使用後 ターゲットに追加
　2HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃が発動
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分

「ジャンプ」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・BRV攻撃前に
　自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを
　味方全員に加算

desc.en:
「Healing Petals」 buff gains the following effect:
- Grants party 「HP Regen」

When using 「Cherry Blossom」:
- Raises party BRV based on Max BRV before the BRV Hits
- Tremendously raises BRV potency
- Greatly raises Max BRV overflow limit of stolen BRV
desc.gl:
Adds party HP Regen effect to Soothing Petals

When using Cherry Blossom:
 • Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV before first BRV attack
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Greatly increased limit for stolen BRV that may exceed MAX BRV

・最初のBRV攻撃前に味方全員に
　自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
・BRV威力極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限大アップ
